message.content:
cs.DB, cs.CR, cs.LG, cs.DS, cs.SI. 

The paper deals with sharing real-time aggregate statistics of private data, which is a topic related to data management and privacy (cs.DB). The proposed framework uses differential privacy to protect the privacy of the data, which falls under the category of cryptography and security (cs.CR). The framework also involves filtering and adaptive sampling to minimize the overall privacy cost and improve the accuracy of data release, which are topics related to machine learning and statistics (cs.LG) and data structures and algorithms (cs.DS). Finally, the paper discusses the potential applications of the proposed framework in monitoring various phenomena, which is a topic related to social and information networks (cs.SI).
